com.facebook.buck.core.rules.resolver.impl

Class AbstractActionGraphBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.core.rules.impl.AbstractBuildRuleResolver
      • com.facebook.buck.core.rules.resolver.impl.AbstractActionGraphBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionGraphBuilder, BuildRuleResolver, SourcePathRuleFinder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiThreadedActionGraphBuilder, RuleAnalysisCompatibleDelegatingActionGraphBuilder

    public abstract class AbstractActionGraphBuilder
extends AbstractBuildRuleResolver
implements ActionGraphBuilder
    An abstract implementation of BuildRuleResolver that simplifies concrete implementations.
